T3 Fake tear can be in any position not limited to P2
Volcarona doesn't need any Hp or Spdef Evs
Charizard with 31 speed iv 252 ev NEUTRAL nature outslows jirachi w Ironball. I'd recommend Charizard 252 HP and 252 Spdef as it's used in 5* Jirachi
Good slow pokemon -> Quiet nature 0 speed iv: Magmortar, Heatmor, Chandelure, Iron ball charizard (HA makes it hit super hard)
